grouping.threshold_application: Queensland applies a single threshold to grouped employers; the higher rate applies once taxable wages exceed the first tier.
rules: Corporations related through control or ownership share the Queensland threshold.
Businesses with interdependent operations may be grouped under commissioner discretion.

nexus: Wages for services performed in Queensland.
Wages paid in Queensland for employees who mainly work in the state.
Deemed wages to contractors connected to Queensland.

levies.name: Health Services Levy
levies.notes: Illustrative levy to demonstrate toggling based on effective dates.
